repnme.cdata!:
Peru - Regional Transport Infrastructure
            Decentralization Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Regional Transport Infrastructure
            Decentralization Project in Peru has received the following
            ratings: 'Moderately Satisfactory' for project
            preparation, design, and quality at entry; 'High -
            before and after restructuring' for relevance of
            objectives, design and implementation; 'Modest before
            restructuring and Substantial after restructuring' for
            achievement of project development objectives; 'Modest
            before and after restructuring' for Efficiency;
            'Moderately Satisfactory' for justification of
            overall outcome rating; 'Substantial' for
            assessment of risk to development outcome; 'Moderately
            Satisfactory' for Bank performance; and
            'Moderately Satisfactory' for overall borrower
            performance. Some of the lessons learned pertain to the
            areas of project design, operational details, and
            decentralization in the country.
